titles.title: A joint resolution designating the week of September 20, 1987, through September 26, 1987, as "National Mushroom Week".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/3/1987--Introduced. Designates the week of September 20 through September 26, 1987, as National Mushroom Week.
